description:
The daughter of a low-ranking noble, Priscilla had just a tiny bit of mysterious power in her hands. 

Priscilla, who worked in the Royal Palace, met with a high-ranking noble, Cleatt Brody, who was tired from work and offered him some resting time, however...

A heartwarming romance, part 1 of the Lucott Kingdom Series.>
